doc.str: We are looking for a PHP Developer with basic web development skills to join our tech team. This is a uni que opportunity to work in one of the best multi-award winning financial start-ups in London and make a difference. You will be working along one of the co-founders The successful candidate will have a computer science degree or just have that natural flair and talent for web development that allows them to stand above the cro Please apply below. Applicants must be eligible to work in the UK. Applicants must be able to sit with a team based in Mayfair, London.
